name: Stickman Downhill Monstertruck
description:
NOW FREE FOR A VERY LIMITED TIME! GET IT NOW UNTIL PRICE IS BACK TO NORMAL!
Stickman Downhill - Monster Truck is the third edition of the Stickman Downhill series. Experience ultra realistic and fast paced action packed Monster Truck racing in stunning environments. Choose from more than 15 different trucks, including very special ones like a school bus, shopping cart, crane, a kerosene powered rocket turbine truck and even a mini RC Monster Truck. Race in various different locations, ranging from tracks in deep forest to mountain tracks high up in the air. Every truck is designed by hand with its own physics, handling and realistic sounds.

Additionally compete with your friends in special tournament cups, share your gameplay videos and watch other peoples best rides.

• From the makers of various top hits like Stickman Skate Park, Stickman Soccer, Stickman Ice Hockey, Stickman Basketball, Stickman Cliff Diving, Stickman Base Jumper, Rope'n'Fly and more...

Features
• Unique and beautiful graphic style
• More than 50 beautiful designed tracks 
• Downhill tracks, trial tracks, race tracks, free ride tracks, etc. 
• More than 15 different designed ultra realistic trucks including very special ones like a school bus, a shopping cart, a crane, a kerosene powered rocket turbine truck and even a mini RC Monster Truck
• Fully physic enabled trucks and physic enabled player for spectacular crashes
• Unique physics, handling and realistic sound for each truck
• Different amazing atmospheric locations, from forest to mountains, etc.
• Get achievements for special stunts
 • Directly compare to your friends and all other players with the integrated leaderboard and tournament tracks 
• Directly record your gameplay and share your best rides or crashes with your friends on Facebook, Youtube or Twitter
• Tilt or button control, whichever you prefer
• MFI Game Controllers support

In-Apps: The in-apps may optionally be used as shortcut to get Trucks and Tracks without having to progress through the game.

Take a look at the Stickman Downhill - Monster Truck Trailer : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YhPHyxwrDBI

Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possible.

Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!
